info.title: Request for Quotation
info.description: The service contains header, item, and bidder nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload. All information is utilized when creating an RFQ with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations. Once the RFQ has been successfully created, the RFQ number is sent in the response with the data included in the RFQ. If any issues arise when the RFQ is created, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, and update requests for quotations from or in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this service

values.text: [Collaborative Manufacturing with SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud(1NX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NX " Link To BP ")
[Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(1A0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1A0 " Link To BP ")
[Supplier Quote Automation with SAP Ariba Commerce Automation(1L2)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1L2 " Link To BP ")
[Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(OA0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OA0 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Purchasing Document (MM_PURDOC_HEADER)
* Procurement: Purchasing Document Item (MM_PURDOC_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Gets the header details of all the requests for quotations in the system.
get.description: Gets the header details of all the requests for quotations in the system. Note that if there are many RFQs in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.summary: Creates a header of a new RFQ with the details passed in the request body.
post.description: Updates the header details of an RFQ such as purchasing document category, quotation deadline, RFQ status and publishing date using the RFQ number provided.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description: Request for Quotation

get.summary: Gets the header details of an RFQ.
get.description: Gets the header details of an RFQ such as purchasing document type, quotation deadline and so on of an RFQ using the RFQ number provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

patch.summary: Updates the header details of an RFQ.
patch.description: Updates information in the header of an RFQ such as purchasing document category, quotation deadline, RFQ status and publishing date.

delete.description: Deletes an RFQ with all included information. It is mandatory to pass the RFQ number “RequestForQuotation” in the request body.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description: Request for Quotation

get.summary: Gets the bidder details of an RFQ.
get.description: Gets information about all bidders of an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description: Adds a bidder with such details as supplier information and partner counter to an RFQ. It is mandatory to pass the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" and the counter number "PartnerCounter" in the request body.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description: Request for Quotation

get.summary: Gets the item details from an RFQ.
get.description: Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity, and so on of an item in an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds an item to an RFQ.
post.description: Adds an item to an RFQ using the RFQ number provided. It is mandatory to pass the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" in the request body along with details like material, plant, quantity and so on.

get.summary: Gets all bidders from an RFQs.
get.description: Gets the details of all bidders from an RFQ in the system. Note that if there are many RFQs in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds one or several bidders to an RFQ.
post.description: Adds one or several bidders to an RFQ using the RFQ number “RequestForQuotation” provided.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

parameters.name: PartnerCounter
parameters.description: Partner counter

get.summary: Gets the bidder details of an RFQ by partner counter.
get.description: Gets the bidder details from an RFQ by the sequence number of a bidder using the RFQ number “RequestForQuotation” and the partner counter number "PartnerCounter" provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the details of a bidder in an RFQ.
patch.description: Updates the details of a bidder in an RFQ using the RFQ number “RequestForQuotation” and the partner counter number “PartnerCounter” provided.

delete.summary: Deletes the bidder from the RFQ.
delete.description: Deletes the bidder from the RFQ using the RFQ number and the partner counter provided.

get.summary: Gets the details of all items in all RFQs in the system.
get.description: Gets the details of all items in all RFQs in the system. Note, that if there are many RFQs in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.summary: Adds an item to an RFQ.
post.description: Adds an item with details like material, quantity, price unit, and so on to an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided. It is mandatory to pass the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" in the request body.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotationItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Request For Quotation

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

get.summary: Gets the item details of an RFQ.
get.description: Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity, and so on of an item in an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the item details of in an RFQ.
patch.description: Updates the item details of in an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided.

delete.summary: Deletes an item in an RFQ.
delete.description: Deletes an item from an RFQ using the RFQ number "RequestForQuotation" provided.

post.description: Completes the bidding process. The RFQ gets the status „Completed“. This happens only if all referenced supplier quotations are set to status “Completed”. The awarded supplier quotation must have a defined follow-up document that is either purchase order or contract. The RFQs in status “Completed” can be archived.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description:
Request for Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description: Cancels the bidding process. The RFQ can be cancelled only if all referenced supplier quotations were cancelled previously. It is not possible to create a follow-up document. The RFQs in status “Cancelled” can be archived.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description:
Request for Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description: Submits RFQ for approval and triggers the defined workflow process. The RFQ is either approved automatically of sent to the approver defined in the workflow settings. The RFQ is either approved automatically or sent to the approver defined in the workflow settings.

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description:
Request for Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_RequestForQuotation HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
